text: Khost () is one of the thirty-four provinces of Afghanistan. It is in the east of the country. Khost province used to be part of Paktia Province in the past. Its capital is Khost. The current Governor of the Province is Abdul Jabbar Naeemi.Naval Postgraduate school Khost Province Executive summary There are 638,849 living in the Province. They are mostly Pashtun. ==Districts== Districts of Khost Province District Capital Populationhttp://www.mrrd.gov.af/nabdp/Provincial%20Profiles/Khost%20PDP%20Provincial%20profile.pdf Khost Provincial Profile AreaAfghanistan Geographic & Thematic Layers Notes Bak 27,675 Gurbuz 30,751 Zazi Maidan 23,197 Khost Matun 160,214 Mandozayi 61,682 Musakhel 41,998 Nadir Shah Kot 37,193 Qalandar 11,406 Sabari 89,779 Shamal 13,523 Shifted from Paktia Province in 2005 Spera 26,685 Tani 67,096 Tirazayi ==References== Category:Provinces of Afghanistan
title: Khost Province
